'''Lucky Dog's Clover''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Lucky Dog]].

==Description==
One who is favored by fortune tends to experience at least their fair share of miracles.<br />The legendary four-leaf clover, for instance, is a precious find that brings luck to its bearer.<br />Once, while playing in the field, the carefree young boy known as Lucky Dog happened across just such a clover.<br />Delighted, he plucked it from the ground and put it in his pocket.<br />No one knows whether it was the clover which brought him his good fortune, or the other way around.
